app_index.foSuOnThApTxt: For support on this application, go to:

app_license.autoTxt:
When this device is connected to the Internet, the license key can be retrieved and installed automatically by providing the license code.

This device does currently not have internet connection and therefore automatic installation is not possible.
app_license.err2Txt: The product could not be identified.
app_license.err4Txt: This license code has been cancelled.
app_license.err5Txt: This license code has been used already.
app_license.err6Txt: A trial application has already been registered on this device.

app_license.err9Txt: This application has already been registered on the device using a different code.

app_license.err26Txt: The application version is not in the range that is allowed for this license key. Install license key anyway?
app_license.err27Txt: Failed to connect to www.axis.com. Make sure that the device has internet access and that the network settings are correct.
app_license.err28Txt: Failed to receive the license key from the Axis web service.
app_license.err30Txt: The serial number associated with the key does not match that of the product. Install license key anyway?
app_license.err31Txt: The license key has expired. Install license key anyway?

app_license.manualTxt: To retrieve a license key for this application, go to
